1450460.name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 it's a Night Magic + GP01
1450460.description:
GP01 New Features

[Dance]

・Pole dancing "fusionic addiction" is added.
・New dancing song『secret deep blue』is added. It brings about an adult ambiance!

[Edit]
・New face edit items are added to the editing function!


[Empire Life Mode]
・In this mode, you can see a conversation between maids you created!

[Facility]
・New facility "Pole dancing room" is added!

[My Room Custom Parts]
・A lot of new "my room custom parts" are added to decorate Master's room!

The costumes included in this DLC are compatible with both the High Poly Body and Normal Body.
You can use them in both COM3D2 and COM3D2.5.

*When purchasing the all-ages version of GP01, please make sure to check whether you already have the adult patch and your installation status of GP01, among other things.
The product above is the all-ages version, so it is irrelevant to users who are already enjoying GP01.
